title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async support, streaming, embeddings, chat & generate endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; promises, streams, embeddings, chat APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, embeddings with async streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich terminal UI for Ollama (fzf model picker, markdown rendering, chat history, keybindings).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code with inline completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with chat, generate, pull, delete, embeddings and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-ts
summary: TypeScript-first wrapper around ollama-js with Zod validation and auto-generated types from OpenAPI.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models (Rust backend, React frontend).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU, CUDA, ROCm) with one-line run commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that brings Ollama models into channels/DMs with mentions, threads and ephemeral responses.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama service with automatic model pulling and GPU drivers.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Minimal distroless container for Ollama reducing attack surface and image size (~40 MB).
